thread.title: Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez drug tested on international duty with Chile after crushing defeat to Argentina
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez drug tested on international duty with Chile after crushing defeat to Argentina

author: whaughton
title: Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez drug tested on international duty with Chile after crushing defeat to Argentina
text:
Testing times Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez drug tested on international duty with Chile after crushing defeat to Argentina 
Arsenal star striker has cut a frustrated figure in recent times but looked more relaxed as he sat down with FIFA officials for Confederations Cup drug testing on Sunday Pictured 27th March 2017, 12:49 pm Updated: 27th March 2017, 1:21 pm
